channel.title: time-series on Catbird Analytics
channel.description: Recent content in time-series on Catbird Analytics

item.title: R Time Series Objects vs Data Frames: Advantages and Limitations
item.description: Time Series Essentials Time Series Strengths Time Series Manipulation/Calculation Visualization Decomposition Plots Forecasting Conclusion Resources As I learn more and more about R, questions often arise about which packages/methods/tools to use for a given situation. R is a vast - and growing - universe and I’m not interested in learning everything in that universe. I’m interested in learning the shortest paths between where I am now and my objective.
